name: Draw Ramp Jumping!
description:
How to get to the other side? This is quite a serious existential question. But not in our game! In our game, all you need is a decent ramp, good will, and some practice!

Lots of vehicles and interesting levels at your disposal. Fire up the afterburner and go ahead! Draw ramps, jump, and destroy everything on your way. Keep trying until you hit the target with your vehicle

We loyally warn you, this game is addictive! You will probably soak in for hours, and probably lose your sense of time! So you better drop everything and start right away!
